item.title: lxmpicturelab
item.description: Comparison of different picture formation algorithms: native, TCAMv3, ARRIreveal, AgX, AgX.blender, AgXc, ACESv1.3-gm, ACESv2.0-gm, ACESv2.0, OpenDRT, 2499DRT, Kodak2383

item.description: assets for comparison of film photography rendering against arbitrary digital photography rendering

item.title: My unusual film scanning workflow
item.description: Reviewing the software workflow I have been using for the past 2024 year to convert scanned negative to positive images.

item.description: Web-app for converting Kelvin temperature to RGB colorspaces.
